info.headline: Flood Advisory issued November 6 at 3:54PM ChST until November 6 at 5:45PM ChST by NWS Tiyan GU
info.description:
* WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...Guam.
* WHEN...Until 645 PM ChST.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. Some low-water crossings may become impassable. River or stream flows are elevated. Rises in small streams.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 354 PM ChST, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 0.4 and 1 inch of rain has fallen during the past hour. Additional rainfall of 1 to 2 inches are possible through 6:45 PM. - Additional rainfall amounts of 0.6 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Dededo, Tamuning, Yigo, Mangilao, Chalan Pago-Ordot, Barrigada, Yona, Hagatna Heights, Andersen AFB, Talofofo, Mongmong-Toto-Maite, Sinajana, Inarajan, Asan, Merizo, Piti, Santa Rita and Umatac. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CHST THIS AFTERNOON
